channel.title: CVE Feed for Zoom Video Communications, Inc. -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Zoom Video Communications, Inc. -- all products

item.title: CVE-2024-27244|2024-06-06T15:21:25.196Z -- zoom%20video%20communications%2C%20inc. -- zoom%20workplace%20vdi%20app%20for%20windows
item.description: Insufficient verification of data authenticity in the installer for Zoom Workplace VDI App for Windows may allow an authenticated user to conduct an escalation of privilege via local access.

item.title: CVE-2024-24696|2024-02-13T23:51:34.285Z -- zoom%20video%20communications%2C%20inc. -- zoom%20desktop%20client%20for%20windows%2C%20zoom%20vdi%20client%20for%20windows%2C%20and%20zoom%20meeting%20sdk%20for%20windows
item.description: Improper input validation in Zoom Desktop Client for Windows, Zoom VDI Client for Windows, and Zoom Meeting SDK for Windows may allow an authenticated user to conduct a disclosure of information via network access.
